plot: Timur, a policeman whose career is on the rise, is forced to break the law in order to save his fiancee, Keira. In so doing, he also uncovers the conspiracy of a global corporation trying to gain control of people's minds and change to course of history...
title: Hunting the Phantom
plot_es: Timur, a policeman whose career is on the rise, is forced to break the law in order to save his fiancee, Keira. In so doing, he also uncovers the conspiracy of a global corporation trying to gain control of people's minds and change to course of history...
plot_en: Timur, a policeman whose career is on the rise, is forced to break the law in order to save his fiancee, Keira. In so doing, he also uncovers the conspiracy of a global corporation trying to gain control of people's minds and change to course of history...
